sentences.sentence: When you hold the hand of your friend, do it very alertly.
sentences.translation: 当你握住朋友的手时，很警觉的做它。

sentences.sentence: And can discover alertly slightly, these 3 users are systematic manager actually.
sentences.translation: 而稍加留意便会发现，这3名用户其实都是系统治理员。

sentences.sentence: To understand, mind must delve deeply and yet it must know when to be alertly passive.
sentences.translation: 为了理解，心必须深入探究，还要知道什么时候保持警觉的被动。
